short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape tabular data from a web page for your labels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome Extension scrapes data from tables (HTML table, or ag-grid, or slick-grid)  on any web site and uses it as data to create labels (as PDFs).

The labels can include text, bitmaps and barcodes.

The software serves as a frontend to our Next Generation Label Printing System that offers similar functionality via Addin/Addon for Google Sheets and Mircosoft Office for serveral years now.

We also license our software for on premises use, where we are able to  integrate  printers used in packaging lines. 

We have a functionality to display the labels on Electronic Shelf Labels (ESL).
